pros: Attacks deal lots of lines/hits per attack
Lots of mobility with Skills with Cannon Jump, Monkey Push, and Blast Back
You have a monkey companion that follows you around!
Has several summons that fight alongside you
Has increased inventory space from Master of Organization
cons: Attack Speed is quite slow but has lots of Attack Speed modifiers
Cannoneer attacks are mainly horizontal attacking with few vertical Skills

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives, Buckshot's %Final Damage decrease, and buffs with cooldowns
Block Chance: +35%
Crit Damage: +5% + (10% when Monkey Wave buff is active)

buffInfo.active: , , , , ,
buffInfo.summons: (10s cd), (90s cd), (120s cd), (60s cd)
buffInfo.buffCd: (180s cd), (480 - 180s cd), (120s cd)
buffInfo.buffFifth: (180s cd), (180s cd ), (70 - 64s cd)
buffInfo.iFrame: (30s cd)

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Pirate to reach Master Level
The stats are affected by %Stat bonuses

[Note]: Link Skill has a togglable effect where you can swap all STR + %STR into DEX + %DEX and vice versa
  • Double-click the Link Skill to turn this effect on/off
  • The effect only applies to the original Link Skill, not the transferred version

info: To create one, choose the 'Cannoneer' option in the Character Creation screen. Cannoneers have their own separate creation button like Dual Blade and Pathfinder. As well, they have a different story than regular Explorers but are part of the same class group

build: -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level 20 & 30

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Monkey Militia - Enhance
  • Cannon Bazooka - Reinforce and Extra Strike
  • Cannon Barrage - Reinforce and Extra Strike

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Homeward Cannon
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to the Nautilus when used.\nCooldown: 600 sec
details: Gained from completing the quest 'Return to The Nautilus' from Kyrin at Lv. 20

primary.name: Master of Swimming
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases swimming speed and prevents HP loss when swimming.

primary.name: Master of Organization
primary.shortDesc: Permanently expands Equip, Use, Set-up, and Etc. Inventory.

primary.name: Cannon Blaster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Damage: 265%, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Fires your cannon forward at multiple enemies

primary.name: Cannon Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 9, Damage: 95%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Launches a strike forward at one enemy

primary.name: Blast Back
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 225%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, 55% chance of decreasing the Movement Speed of target by -45 for 4 sec
primary.desc: Fires your cannon causing you to recoil backward
details: The attack has a chance to slow enemies

primary.name: Monkey Push
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Cannon Boost
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20, Defense: +250

primary.name: Scatter Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 185%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Fires several explosive cannonballs forward

primary.name: Barrel Bomb
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28, Damage: 70%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 3, Knockback Chance: 100%, Explode dealing 370% damage after moving a fixed distance.
primary.desc: Fires a rolling barrel that travels a short distance before exploding
details: Attack pushes enemies back

primary.name: Cannon Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Attack Speed increased for 180 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Monkey Magic
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55, Duration: 180 sec, HP: +400, MP: +400, All Stats: +30, Speed: +10, Jump +5

primary.name: Critical Fire
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +5%

primary.name: Cannon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Cannon Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Pirate Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Cannon Spike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 36, Damage: 240%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Fires a spike that pierces through enemies

primary.name: Monkey Fury
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 62, Damage: 180%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 3, Damage per second: 200% for 30 sec with a 100% chance. Damage: +40% to pertinent enemy, Cooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Launches a bomb that bounces around damages enemies and debuffs them
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Damage and takes damage periodically

primary.name: Monkey Wave
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55, Max Damage: 860%, Stun Chance: 95%, Stun Duration: 4 sec. After full strength use: Critical Damage +5% for 30 sec. After Critical: 50% chance of full strength within 15 sec.\n[Passive effect: Critical Rate: +20%]
primary.desc: Creates a large shockwave that damages enemies and has a chance to stun
details:
When Monkey Wave is fully charged and released, you gain a buff that increases %Crit Damage
  • While buff is active, you have a chance while attacking to use Monkey Wave at full strength without charging. There will be a symbol above your head when it is ready
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Crit Rate

primary.name: Cannon Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 210%, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Fires your cannon, launching you up into the air
details:
Can be activated using the Skill Key or by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key while in the air
  • Can be used up to two times in a row

primary.name: Barrel Roulette
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60, applies a random buff for 180 sec.
Lightning: [Final Attack Skills] When attacking with a direct skill, additional attack to 6 enemies for 150% damage.
Ice: Critical Damage: +5%.
Slow: When attacking, 50% chance of applying Slow Abnormal Status for 5 sec to all enemies, including bosses.
Skull: When attacking, continuous damage of 200% Damage every 1 sec for 5 sec.
Cooldown: 180 sec
[Passive Effects: Final damage +10%]

primary.name: Roll of the Dice
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Buff Duration: 180, Cooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Grants a buff depending on the number rolled
details: [One]: Nothing
[Two]: Increases %DEF
[Three]: Increases %Max HP/MP
[Four]: Increases %Crit Rate
[Five]: Increases %Damage
[Six]: Increases %EXP Rate

primary.name: Reinforced Cannon
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Attack Power by 40 and Attack Speed by 1 level.

primary.name: Pirate Rush
primary.shortDesc: HP: +20%, DEF +50%, Abnormal Status Resistance +20

primary.name: Counter Crush
primary.shortDesc: 20% chance of blocking an enemy attack and countering with 200% damage.

primary.name: Cannon Bazooka
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Damage: 545%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Fires a large explosive blast forward

primary.name: Cannon Barrage
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 63, Number of Attacks: 4, Damage: 750%, Bonus Critical Rate: 15%, Ignore DEF: 20%
primary.desc: Launches a barrage of cannonballs at one enemy
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate and %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Anchors Aweigh
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 86, Summon Duration: 20 sec. Pulls the enemy forward while dealing 460% damage at fixed intervals. When duration has run out, will explode to deal 625% additional damage
primary.desc: Summons an anchor that pulls in nearby enemies towards it while dealing damage
details: When the duration runs out, the anchor will explode

primary.name: Monkey Militia
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Summon Duration: 60 sec, Damage: 295%\nCooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Summons a stationary sentry that attacks nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Nautilus Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Damage: 510%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 5\nCooldown: 30 sec\nUpon use, remaining Cooldown -50% for Barrel Roulette and Roll of the Dice
primary.desc: Launches a massive attack that hits a large area while also granting you a buff
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect
When used, reduces remaining cooldown of and slightly

primary.name: Pirate's Spirit
primary.shortDesc: Active Effect - MP Cost: 80, Duration: 180 sec, Knockback Resistance: +80%\n[Passive Effect - Permanently increases chance of counterattack by 15%, increases damage when attacking a boss by 40%.]
primary.desc: Increases %Knockback Resistance
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Boss Damage and the chance for to activate

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Cannon Overload
primary.shortDesc: Permanent Final Damage: +30%, Attack Speed: +1, Mastery: +70%. Enemy DEF ignored by 20%.
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now increases %Final Damage, Attack Speed (by 1 stage), and %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Mega Monkey Magic
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Duration: 180 sec, HP: +1000, MP: +1000, All Stats: +60, Speed: +15, Jump +10
primary.desc: Increases amount of stats provided

primary.name: Double Down
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, 50% chance of rolling a Double Down, Buff Duration: 180 sec\nCooldown: 180 sec
details: Grants a chance to roll two dices at once

hyperActive.name: Buckshot
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Number of Attacks for Skills: +3 time(s), Duration: 180 sec, Final Damage: -45%\nNumber of attacks cannot exceed 15.
hyperActive.desc: Triples the number of attacks for your skills but you have reduced %Final Damage
details: Does not apply to summons
Number of attacks cannot exceed 15 lines/hits
Has no cooldown

hyperActive.name: Rolling Rainbow
hyperActive.shortDesc: Installation skill. MP Cost: 300, Damage: 600% to 10 enemies within a range, Number of attacks: 3, Duration: 12 sec.\nCooldown: 90 sec
hyperActive.desc: Summons several cannons that fire a continuous wave of lasers

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Explorer class in the party

fifthMain.name: Cannon of Mass Destruction
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, periodically fires a giant rocket, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 825%, Number of Attacks: 4.\nYou can prepare a rocket once every 25 seconds, and can hold up to 3.\nCooldown: 3 Sec.
fifthMain.desc: Fires a large rocket that slowly travels and damages enemies it touches
details: Gain 1 Rocket every 25 secs (max 3 Rockets)
Each enemy can only be hit up to 50 times by a rocket

fifthMain.name: The Nuclear Option
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, You have up to 5 sec to aim your shot. The skill is canceled if you fail to fire within this time. The explosion inflicts 2400% damage 5 times to up to 15 enemies for 1 sec.\nCreates a patch of Polluted Area lasting for 15 sec on the lowest platform within attack range which inflicts 1000% damage to up to 10 enemies.\nCooldown: 30 sec
fifthMain.desc: Aims your cannon and fires a missile in a chosen direction that explodes and creates a lingering damaging field
details:
Hold to aim the cannon and angle it by using the Up or Down Arrow Keys
  • You have up to 5 secs to aim or the Skill will cancel if you fail to fire within this time

fifthMain.name: Monkey Business
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Summon the Champion Monkey Platoon that fires Monkey Bombs and Monkey Cannons for 42 sec
 Monkey Cannon: Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 600%, Attack Count: 4
Monkey Bomb: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 900%, Attack Count: 7, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: 100%
Basic Roy: Uses Monkey Cannon every 1 sec, and Monkey Bomb every 6 sec.
Speedy Maxi: Uses Monkey Cannon every 0.7 sec, and Monkey Bomb every 30 sec.
Explosive Khakkee: Uses Monkey Cannon every 2.5 sec, and Monkey Bomb every 3 sec.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons several monkeys to fight alongside you
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Poolmaker
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000. Strikes that attack up to 8 enemies for 1400% damage, 3 time(s), occur 20 time(s) each.\nSupply: Duration: 20 sec. When used, you'll gain a +27% damage increase buff, with a duration of 20 sec after recovering 17% of max HP. Only up to 2 supplies can exist on the map at a time.\nCooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Launches a barrage of missiles that slowly rain down onto enemies
details:
Additionally while the skill is active, a Supply Crate will drop that restores some %Max HP/MP and grants a %Damage buff
  • Party members can also activate the Supply Crate and gain its effects
  • To activate the Supply Crate, press the Up Arrow Key on it
  • Up to 2 Supply Crates can be present on a map at one time
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Cannoneer is a STR pirate class part of the Explorers class group. Cannoneers wield a Hand Cannon which they use to wreck havoc on enemies and control the map. They have a slow Attack Speed but make up with deadly attacks that deal tons of damage
